structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Effect Of Unaccepted Offer Of Judgment
law.text: An offer of judgment made under the provisions of the Massachusetts Rules of Civil Procedure or the District-Municipal Courts Rules of Civil Procedure which is not accepted shall not be evidence against the party making it, either in a subsequent proceeding in the action in which it is made or in another action or suit.
